titleStmt.title: The Harmony of the muses, or, The gentlemans and ladies choisest recreation full of various, pure and transcendent wit : containing severall excellent poems, some fancies of love, some of disdain, and all the subjects incident to the passionate affections either of men or women / heretofore written by those unimitable masters of learning and invention, Dr. Joh. Donn, Dr. Hen. King, Dr. W. Stroad [et al].

The Harmony of the muses, or, The gentlemans and ladies choisest recreation full of various, pure and transcendent wit : containing severall excellent poems, some fancies of love, some of disdain, and all the subjects incident to the passionate affections either of men or women / heretofore written by those unimitable masters of learning and invention, Dr. Joh. Donn, Dr. Hen. King, Dr. W. Stroad [et al].
titleStmt.author: R. C.
Donne, John, 1572-1631.
King, Henry, 1592-1669.
Strode, William, 1600 or 1601-1645.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.W. for William Gilbertson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
